feature.label: iSphere Job Trace Explorer for RDi 8.0+ (optional)
feature.description: iSphere Journal Explorer for RDi 8.0+ The "iSphere Job Trace Explorer Feature (RDi)" provides a set of views for exploring job traces recored with the STRTRC command. It can be started from menu 'Window -> Show View'.
feature.copyright: iSphere Journal Explorer for RDi 8.0+ The "iSphere Journal Explorer Feature (RDi)" provides a set of view for exploring journals. It can be started from menu 'Window -> Show View'.
